name: Yet Another Transparent Firefox Theme
description:
Very Firefox, such transparent. Wow.

Works well on both light and dark backgrounds! (Windows Vista or Windows 7 required)

UPDATED to work on new versions of Firefox!
additional_info:
I'm using this with Firefox 32 but I think it should work on anything 29+. 

This is just my own personal theme I've been using. I'm uploading this on the off-chance that someone else happens to like it as well. That said, you'll want to make sure Windows Aero is enabled with transparency for this to work. As far as I know, this won't work in Windows 8 or 10 since they removed the glass transparency effect. This comes as-is, no guarantees whatsoever. =P

9/15/2015-Incorporated changes from user Bubi that fixes a bug with tabs. Thanks Bubi!
